title: When Praised Dua
description: Authentic supplications for When Praised Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for When Praised Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 232
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ لاَ تُؤَاخِذْنِي بِمَا يَقُولُونَ، وَاغْفِرْ لِي مَا لاَ يَعْلَمُونَ، [وَاجْعَلْنِي خَيْراً مِمَّا يَظُّنُّونَ])).
items.transliteration: Allaahumma laa tu'aakhithnee bimaa yaqooloona, waghfir lee maa laa ya'lamoona [waj'alnee khayram-mimmaa yadhunnoon]
items.translation: O Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine].
